name: Appartements Dr. Geisler
description: Our house is situated in a central yet quiet position in Mayrhofen. A small supermarket with bakery can be found directly opposite.  The lifts are very close by, and the adventure swimming pool can be found in the same road, and is a 3 minute walk away.
Directions: Railway station Mayrhofen - Einfahrt Mitte - post office - straight over next junction - after 10m turn in to the next road on the right - first house on the left "Haus Dr. Geisler".

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Single bedroom, 2 double rooms, lounge/kitchen, 2 X shower/WC, entrance hall with cloakroom, separate entrance, balcony with chairs, wooden flooring with rugs, quiet, situated close to a bakery, grocery store and the lifts.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: two double-rooms, two showers an toilets, livingroom and kitchen with tv , dish washer, coffee machine, microwave and friidge, own entry, extra bed aviable

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description: double room with a shower and a toilet with tv dish washer, a coffee machine. a microwave and a fridge, a coffe machine and a own entry

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet
makesOffer.description: a wonderful apartement with panorama view, a large livingroom and a well equiped kitchen.
